Text: Oñ Je̩fta, e̩ne̩ Gilead, chʼagbiti ogu kʼi nʼuwohi, i muda chʼo̩ma ajo̩ko̩. Gilead le̩ la bi Je̩fta.
O̩ya Gilead la fʼamo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ bi ñw u; tak e̩gba kʼamo̩ma kʼo̩ya-wñ le̩ bi gbakpa, ma fu Je̩fta ne bʼunyi te̩, ma la ka ñw u kakini, Uwe̩ la aje̩ e̩wñ ogu unyi ata-wa n; todu iye-we̩ chʼojoji.
Taku Je̩fta ra bʼamo̩ma ata-wñ te̩, oñ i kwogugu ane̩ To̩b; oñ aboke̩le̩ ame̩no̩fogoli iche̩ka wa jo̩ ugbo-wñ, tak owñ kpʼama nyʼañʼane̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu ku ma jo̩ pe̩, amo̩ma Amo̩n chane̩ ekʼogu bʼIsrae̩l.
Oñ e̩gba kʼamo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ chane̩ ekʼogu bʼIsrae̩l, abogijo Gilead gbe̩re̩ Je̩fta ane̩ Tob le̩;
ma ka ñwu Je̩fta kakini, Lewa kʼe̩ chʼachokolobia-wa, todu kʼa ki bʼamo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ jogu.
Taku Je̩fta ka ñw abogijo Gilead kakini, I chʼulaka-mi me̩ che oñ me̩ ne mi bʼunyi ata-mi te̩ n? E̩wñ chi ku me̩ gbe̩re̩ mi abu ku ma kobʼume̩-i?
Tak abogijo Gilead ka ñwu Je̩fta kakini, Todu kʼa wʼugbo we̩ abajo̩-i la de̩, kʼuwe̩ ki lebʼuwa, kʼa bʼamo̩ma Amo̩n jogu; tak uwe̩ ache agboji-wa, kʼa dodo Gilead chaka.
Oñ Je̩fta ka ñw abogijo Gilead kakini, I la che̩wñ ku me̩ dʼumi wʼunyi, kʼu jogu kpai amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩, ku Jihofa la mʼuma ko nyʼumi o̩wo̩, omi ache agboji-me̩ ke n?
Tak abogijo Gilead ka ñwu Je̩fta kakini, Jihofa ki chʼe̩nijali agbagba wa-i; a ache teju o̩la kʼe̩ ka-i chuu.
Taku Je̩fta lebʼabogijo Gilead, oñ amone̩ le̩ dʼowñ che achokolobia kpai agboji-ma; Je̩fta laño̩ kʼo̩la-wñ du jane̩ o̩gba Jihofa Mizpa.
Taku Je̩fta fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩rʼonu amo̩ma Amo̩n, kakini, Ab u chʼe̩, kʼuwe̩ wʼugbo mi kʼe̩ kogu bʼane̩-mi?

Tak onu amo̩ma Amo̩n dohi ñw amonuche̩ Je̩fta le̩, kakini, Todu e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l kwʼIjipti awa le̩ ma mʼane̩-mi gba akwo Amo̩n gbogbo wa Jabo̩k, kpai gbogbo wa Jo̩rdan; todule̩ e̩ namʼo̩wo̩ ta bʼane̩ le̩ te̩ ye̩e̩.
Taki Je̩fta ño̩ fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩rʼonu amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ ge̩.
Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, Abu ku Je̩fta aka de̩ kakini, I chʼabo Israe̩l gbʼane̩ Moab in, kpai ane̩ amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ n,
ama e̩gba ku ma kwʼIjipti wa le̩, abo Israe̩l lale gu ef aje̩tachi le̩ du wa Ohimini Ekpikpa, oñ ma lewa Kede̩sh.

E̩gba le̩ Israe̩l fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩rʼonu Ido̩m kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu mi lale gu ef ane̩-we̩ du; onu Ido̩m muda nyeti n. Ma ño̩ fʼonuche̩ kpe̩rʼonu Moab ge̩; i muda je̩ n. Oñ Israe̩l kwogugu Kede̩sh.

Taku ma le ef aje̩tachi le̩, oñ ma dagbala le ej ubi ane̩ Ido̩m kpai ane̩ Moab, oñ ma lewa o̩wo̩ olodudu ane̩ Moab le̩, ma la rujʼejudaba Arno̩n le̩; ma muda le gu alo̩me̩ du tʼoj ane̩ Moab in, todu Arno̩n le̩ chʼalo̩me̩ Moab.
Tak Israe̩l fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Siho̩n, onu abo Amo̩r, onu He̩shbo̩n le̩; Israe̩l la ka ñw u kakini, A gbo̩ko̩bʼe̩, kʼe̩ je̩ ñw a lale gu ef ane̩-we̩ du nyʼuña e-mi.
Siho̩n muda dʼo̩la Israe̩l rʼochochi kʼi aje̩ ñw u lale gu oj ane̩-wñ du n; abe̩le̩ Siho̩n kʼabo-wñ chaka wa jeju, oñ ma lewa ru Jahaz, taku ma kwo jogu kpai abo Israe̩l.
Taku Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, mu Siho̩n kpai abo-wñ chaka ko nyʼabo Israe̩l o̩wo̩, oñ ma fʼuma gwoda; abe̩le̩ Israe̩l mʼane̩ abo Amo̩r ku ma dodo ane̩ o̩mo̩ chaka gba.
Oñ ma mʼane̩ abo Amo̩r le̩ chaka gba, akwo Amo̩n gbogbo wa Jabo̩k, kpai akwo aje̩tachi gbogbo wa Jo̩rdan.
Abe̩le̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, fʼabo Amo̩r ne kwo bʼamone̩-wñ Israe̩l o̩gba te̩; i ñʼadʼugbo kʼuwe̩ agba ge̩?
I chʼe-i ki Chimosh o̩jo̩-we̩ du ñw e̩ kʼe̩ ne̩, i chʼe-le̩ oñ uwe̩ ane̩ n? Oñ e̩wñ du ku Jihofa O̩jo̩-wa fʼone̩-wñ ne bʼo̩ te̩ bʼuwa o̩gba te̩, e-le̩ oñ a ane̩.
Uwe̩ nyo̩ tu Bele̩k o̩ma Zipo̩r, onu Moab le̩ le? Owñ kuja bʼabo Israe̩l mama me̩? Abe̩k i kogu bʼuma?
Abu kʼabo Israe̩l gugu He̩shbo̩n kpai adogbe-wñ, kpai Aro̩e̩r kpai adogbe-wñ, kpai ewo ewo du ku ma jo̩ o̩la Amo̩n le̩ lale, o̩do̩ oli me̩fa le̩, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma dabi gba iko le̩ n?
I la chʼomi du we̩ re n, e̩ muda che mi e̩bie̩ne̩, ogu kʼe̩ kobʼumi le̩; Jihofa kʼi chʼakajo̩-wa, kʼi fʼajo̩ agbagba amo̩ma Israe̩l kpai amo̩ma Amo̩n ka eñini ke.
I chaka ka abe̩le̩ onu amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ la nyʼo̩la ki Je̩fta kpʼonuche̩ rʼu eti n.
Tak Afu Jihofa lewa bu Je̩fta ma, oñ i lale gu efu Gilead kpai Manasa du, i la lale nyi Mizpe e-Gilead le̩, oñ akwo Mizpe e-Gilead le i lale gudu nyʼugbo amo̩ma Amo̩n.
Taki Je̩fta go̩ ñwu Jihofa, i kakini, Iche̩wñ kʼuwe̩ akʼamo̩ma Amo̩n nyʼumi o̩wo̩ ochochi,
mak e̩gba le̩, e̩ne̩ du ki adufu lʼalugbana-mi wa aledo mi, i ra ñwu mi kʼu mudabi kwugbo amo̩ma Amo̩n le̩ wa, e-le̩ la ache e-Jihofa, oñ nadʼu wa ache iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo.
Abe̩le̩ Je̩fta lale tugbo amo̩ma Amo̩n, kʼi jogu kpai ama; oñ Jihofa mʼuma ko nyʼowñ o̩wo̩.
Tak i kwokpa ma akwo Aro̩e̩r gbogbo wa Minit le̩, owñ ebʼewo ewo ogu, kpai gbogbo wa Abe̩l-che̩ramimi, uku kʼi nʼakpa ma tabale. Abe̩le̩ oñ ma fʼamo̩ma Amo̩n du bʼamo̩ma Israe̩l o̩gba te̩.
Taku Je̩fta lewa Mizpe unyi-wñ le̩; e̩ la go, o̩ma-wñ onobule̩ nʼeicha kpai ido eta aledʼo; owñ la chʼo̩ma kate kʼi ne̩; i nʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩k onobule̩ du tʼowñ le n.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼi fʼu li, i fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, oñ i kakini, Atogwo, o̩ma-mi! E̩ mʼumi oji dalo̩ tabale me̩, e̩ la kwotʼef abo ku ma ma je̩ ñwu mi ñmi n; todu u mʼalu-mi chi ñwu Jihofa, u la neke dabi tʼubi n.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Ata-mi, e̩ mʼalu-we̩ chi ñwu Jihofa me̩, e̩ che mi alu ki kwef alu-we̩ dufu le̩, todabu ki Jihofa fʼache̩-we̩ na abʼoji ame̩nebi-we̩ ma, owñ chʼamo̩ma Amo̩n le̩.
Tak i ka ñw ata-wñ kakini, E̩wñ ʼka ku ma ache mi de̩; tʼumi no̩ ochu meji, kʼu kwʼemi nyʼugbo uwo uwo le̩, kʼu raku todu kʼu ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, omi kpai abigbe̩le̩-mi.
Tak i kakini, Lo ke. Oñ i je̩ ñw u le ochu meji; tak i kwʼo̩mo̩ le owñ, owñ kpai abigbe̩le̩-wñ le̩, oñ i raku oj uwo uwo le̩ todu kʼi ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n le̩.
Oñ i lewatu abu kʼochu meji le̩ jo̩, i mudabi wʼugbo ata-wñ, owñ la chʼo teju ego̩ kʼi go̩ le̩. I la mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du mama ta n. E-le̩ la mud e̩wñ o̩gu Israe̩l
ka kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l abobule̩ ale o̩do̩ o̩do̩ ku ma raku o̩ma Je̩fta o̩ma Gilead le̩ o̩jo̩ me̩le̩ o̩do̩ da o̩do̩ da.
